Classics.title: Hum Aapke Hain Koun
Classics.description: Although Nisha falls for Prem, she agrees to marry his older brother for the good of their families. But fate may have other plans for the lovebirds.
Classics.starring: Madhuri Dixit, Salman Khan, Mohnish Bahl

Classics.title: Cairo Station
Classics.description: A Cairo newsstand vendor's fantasies morph into a dangerous fixation with a lemonade seller as a serial killer begins terrorizing the city.
Classics.starring: Farid Shawqy, Hind Rostom, Youssef Chahine

Classics.title: Pioneers: First Women Filmmakers*
Classics.description: This collection restores films from women who tackled hot-button issues, transcended norms, and left a mark on the history of cinema and the industry.

Classics.title: Know Your Enemy - Japan
Classics.description: Offensive by modern standards, this propaganda film examines the history of Japan from the 1500s to the 1930s. Learn more in the series "Five Came Back."

Classics.title: The Other Side of the Wind
Classics.description: On the last day of his life, a legendary director struggles to complete a new project and contemplates his legacy in this layered film by Orson Welles.

Classics.title: Dark Waters
Classics.description: A fisherman returns home after a three-year absence only to find the woman he loves drifting away, the sailors feuding and his community unraveling.

Classics.title: Tunisian Victory
Classics.description: British and American troops join forces to liberate Nazi-occupied North Africa. Learn more about this propaganda film in the series "Five Came Back."

Classics.title: Prelude to War
Classics.description: Frank Capra chronicles the rise of authoritarianism in Germany, Italy and Japan. Learn more about this state-funded film in the series "Five Came Back."

Classics.title: Nazi Concentration Camps
Classics.description: Shocking footage shows Nazi concentration camps after liberation. Learn more about this government-funded film in the docuseries "Five Came Back."

Classics.title: The Memphis Belle: A Story of a Flying Fortress
Classics.description: This film follows the crew of the B-17 Flying Fortress Memphis Belle as it prepares for a mission. Find out more in the docuseries “Five Came Back.”

Classics.title: Hotel Pacific
Classics.description: A motivated teen strives to rise from dishwasher to waiter at a luxury hotel only to tread in the abusive tide of its workplace hierarchy.

Classics.title: Alexandria: Again and Forever
Classics.description: At the peak of his career, Yehia joins a hunger strike, becomes smitten and reckons with a creative crisis — but finds a new muse.

Classics.title: Winter of Our Dreams
Classics.description: After the death of a long-ago lover, married philanderer Rob tracks down her friend, a drug-addicted prostitute desperate to escape her dead-end life.

Classics.title: Saladin
Classics.description: The Sultan of Egypt and Syria launches a campaign to retake Jerusalem amid the Crusades.
Classics.starring: Ahmad Mazhar, Salah Zo El Faqqar, Nadia Lotfi

Classics.title: Thunderbolt
Classics.description: A P-47 Thunderbolt squadron is shown in preparation, at play and in bombing raids during World War II. Learn more in the docuseries “Five Came Back.”

Classics.title: The Battle of Midway
Classics.description: Director John Ford captures combat footage of the Battle of Midway. Learn more about this state-sponsored film in the docuseries "Five Came Back."

Classics.title: The Great Gambler
Classics.description: After unwittingly using his skills to obtain military secrets, a gambler is pursued by a police officer who happens to be his doppelgänger.

Classics.title: Amar Akbar Anthony

Classics.title: The Negro Soldier
Classics.description: This propaganda film urged African Americans to enlist in the Armed Forces during World War II. Learn more in the docuseries "Five Came Back."

Classics.title: The Last Days of Chez Nous

Sports.description: When a move to an exclusive seaside community sends her mother and twin brother into a downward spiral, teenager Medina finds solace in surfing.
Sports.starring: Jennifer Garner, Maika Monroe, Cody Fern

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sam Jay: 3 In The Morning
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian and "Saturday Night Live" writer Sam Jay serves up fresh takes on relationships, travel nightmares, the audacity of white people and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: John Mulaney: New in Town
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Stand-up comedian John Mulaney tackles such red-hot topics as quicksand, Motown singers and an elderly man he once met in a bathroom.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Hannah Gadsby: Nanette

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Dave Chappelle
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedy icon Dave Chappelle makes his triumphant return to the screen with a pair of blistering, fresh stand-up specials.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Rob Schneider: Asian Momma, Mexican Kids
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Former "Saturday Night Live" star Rob Schneider returns to the stage and shares his take on life, love and dinosaur dreams in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: John Mulaney: Kid Gorgeous at Radio City

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Daniel Sloss: Live Shows
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Daniel Sloss is ready to find the funny in some very dark topics, from the deeply personal to the truly irreverent.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ricky Gervais: Humanity
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In his first special in seven years, Ricky Gervais slings his trademark snark at celebrity, mortality and a society that takes everything personally.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin Hart: Irresponsible
Stand-Up Comedy.description: As a father of three on his second marriage, Kevin Hart proves that being him is indeed a tall order in a fresh special inspired by his own mistakes.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: James Acaster: Repertoire
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Offbeat comic James Acaster covers the strange, the mundane and everything in between in this collection of four wide-ranging stand-up specials.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jack Whitehall: I'm Only Joking

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Jefferies: Intolerant
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Between scenes from an excruciating date, Jim Jefferies digs into generational differences, his own bad habits and the shifting boundaries in comedy.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bo Burnham: what.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tig

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bo Burnham: Make Happy
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Combining his trademark wit and self-deprecating humor with original music, Bo Burnham offers up his unique twist on life in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Patton Oswalt: I Love Everything
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Turning 50. Finding love again. Buying a house. Experiencing existential dread at Denny's. Life comes at Patton Oswalt fast in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tig Notaro Happy To Be Here
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Tig Notaro unleashes her inner prankster in a playful stand-up special packed with funny anecdotes, parenting confessions and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: COMEDIANS of the world
Stand-Up Comedy.description: A diverse set of 47 comedians from 13 regions bring their perspective on what's funny around the world. Browse and discover by selecting "Episodes."

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Donald Glover: Weirdo
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Fearlessly funny stand-up comic and sitcom star Donald Glover puts on a live show in New York, confessing his love for Cocoa Puffs and Toys "R" Us.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Trevor Noah: Son of Patricia

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Greg Davies: You Magnificent Beast

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Dave Chappelle: Equanimity & The Bird Revelation

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Russell Howard: Recalibrate

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Gaffigan: Obsessed

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tom Segura: Disgraceful

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kathleen Madigan: Bothering Jesus

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ali Wong: Baby Cobra

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Hasan Minhaj: Homecoming King

Stand-Up Comedy.title: The Standups

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jimmy Carr: The Best of Ultimate Gold Greatest Hits

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jack Whitehall: Christmas with My Father

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jack Whitehall: At Large

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Anthony Jeselnik: Fire in the Maternity Ward

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Burr: Paper Tiger

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Burr: Walk Your Way Out

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin Hart: Seriously Funny

Stand-Up Comedy.title: The Comedy Lineup

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mariusz Kałamaga, Karol Kopiec, Wiolka Walaszczyk Hilarious Trio

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Fary: Hexagone

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Stand Up and Away! with Brian Regan

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Zona Rosa

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katarzyna Piasecka, Rafał Pacześ Seriously Funny

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ladies Up

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Russell Peters vs. the World

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Rafał Banaś, Michał Leja Laugh out Loud
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Young Polish comedians Rafał Banaś and Michał Leja present a high-energy stand-up show at Warsaw's Klub Hybrydy.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Karol Modzelewski, Łukasz „Lotek” Lodkowski No Offense

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tomasz Jachimek, Jacek Stramik Laugh at Live

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Maria Bamford: Old Baby

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Steve Martin and Martin Short: An Evening You Will Forget for the Rest of Your Life

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Garfunkel and Oates: Trying to be Special

Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Riki Lindhome, Kate Micucci, Anthony Jeselnik

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jimmy Carr: Funny Business

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jerry Before Seinfeld

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jen Kirkman: Just Keep Livin’?

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Reggie Watts: Spatial

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Simon Amstell: Set Free

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bridget Christie: Stand Up for Her

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ray Romano: Right Here, Around the Corner

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Chelsea Handler: Uganda Be Kidding Me Live

Stand-Up Comedy.title: John Leguizamo's Latin History for Morons

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Fred Armisen: Standup For Drummers

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Anjelah Johnson: Not Fancy

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tom Segura: Completely Normal

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Hicks: Relentless

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Demetri Martin: The Overthinker

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Marc Maron: Too Real

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Burr: You People Are All the Same

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Joan Rivers: Don't Start with Me

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Chris D'Elia: No Pain

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Burr: I'm Sorry You Feel That Way

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katt Williams: Great America

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Jefferies: Freedumb

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jenny Slate: Stage Fright

Stand-Up Comedy.title: David Cross: Making America Great Again!

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tim Minchin And The Heritage Orchestra Live

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Patton Oswalt: Annihilation

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Burr: Let It Go

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Neal Brennan: 3 Mics

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Pete Davidson: Alive From New York

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bert Kreischer: Hey Big Boy

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sarah Silverman A Speck of Dust

Stand-Up Comedy.title: D.L. Hughley: Clear
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In this 2014 standup special filmed in San Francisco, comedic genius D.L. Hughley entertains with his hilarious take on current affairs and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Michael Che Matters
Stand-Up Comedy.description: "SNL" star Michael Che takes on hot-button topics like inequality, homophobia and gentrification in this stand-up set filmed live in Brooklyn.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Chris Rock: Tamborine
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Chris Rock takes the stage in Brooklyn for a comedy special filled with searing observations on fatherhood, infidelity and American politics.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Deon Cole: Cole Hearted
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Embracing his belief that comedy is the last raw form of expression, Deon Cole explains the right time to thank Jesus and the wrong time to say "welp."

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin Hart: What Now?
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Frenetic comic Kevin Hart hits Philadelphia and dishes on suburban wildlife, jean shorts and the fine art of getting even with a 7-year-old.
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Kevin Hart, Don Cheadle, Halle Berry

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Leslie Jones: Time Machine
Stand-Up Comedy.description: From trying to seduce Prince to battling sleep apnea, Leslie Jones traces her evolution as an adult in a joyfully raw and outrageous stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Def Comedy Jam 25
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In this special live event, giants of stand-up come together to commemorate the 25th anniversary of Russell Simmons's groundbreaking "Def Comedy Jam."
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Dave Chappelle, Steve Harvey, Cedric the Entertainer

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katt Williams: Live
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Outspoken comedian Katt Williams pokes fun at a variety of topics, including sex, relationships, parenthood and trying to make it as an entertainer.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katt Williams: The Pimp Chronicles: Pt. 1
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In this 2006 show, comic Katt Williams uses his edgy style and personal experiences to paint a sassy, hilarious portrait of life in black America.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Lavell Crawford: Can a Brother Get Some Love?
Stand-Up Comedy.description: "Last Comic Standing" runner-up Lavell Crawford lords over a hometown crowd at St. Louis's Orpheum Theatre, raking in the love -- and the laughs.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin Hart: Laugh at My Pain
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Sometimes edgy and always hilarious, comedian Kevin Hart shines in this theatrical version of his record-breaking 2011 live tour.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tiffany Haddish: She Ready! From the Hood To Hollywood!
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedic breakout Tiffany Haddish delivers a riotous stand-up ripe with the unpretentious and filthy tales of her meteoric rise to stardom.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tiffany Haddish: Black Mitzvah
Stand-Up Comedy.description: On her 40th birthday, Tiffany Haddish drops a bombastic special studded with singing, dancing and raunchy reflections on her long road to womanhood.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katt Williams: American Hustle (The Movie)
Stand-Up Comedy.description: An aspiring actor leaves Hollywood and takes to the road to do stand-up after he's cast in a series of increasingly stereotypical "black" roles.
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Katt Williams, Da Brat, Snoop Dogg

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mike Epps: Only One Mike
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In a raw stand-up comedy special, Mike Epps mixes it up as he tackles sexual misconduct, special ed, aging body parts and much more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tumi or not Tumi
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Tumi Morake dishes out hot takes and fiery commentary about the concept of identity, politics, family life, weaves, and more in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Chris Tucker Live
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Filmed in his hometown of Atlanta, Chris Tucker showcases his stand-up comedic chops as he shares his experiences from childhood to the big time.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Gina Yashere: Laughing to America
Stand-Up Comedy.description: British comic Gina Yashere takes the stage in San Francisco, where she shares her thoughts on everything from toilet ninjas to her troublesome name.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katt Williams: Kattpacalypse
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Urban comic Katt Williams ushers in Kattpacalypse, exploding with more energy than an atomic bomb and riffing on everything from Doomsday to Obama.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mo Gilligan: Momentum
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Mo Gilligan blends smooth moves and sharp humor as he riffs on humble beginnings, family dynamics and the complex art of dancing in the club.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: DeRay Davis: How to Act Black
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Dynamic comic DeRay Davis hits the stage like a ball of fire, nailing the finer points of living, dating and handling show business as a Black man.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Cedric the Entertainer: Live from the Ville
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Donning his signature suit and fedora, the dapper comic offers a unique spin on getting old, the presidential election and "Honky Tonk Badonkadonk."

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tracy Morgan: Staying Alive
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In his first special since his serious car accident, Tracy Morgan cracks jokes about life in a coma, his second marriage and his family's dark side.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Marlon Wayans: Woke-ish
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Rollicking, outrageous and audacious, Marlon Wayans gets raw on racism, age-appropriate rap rhymes, gay rights, raising kids and even the Kardashians.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sommore: The Reign Continues
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Self-proclaimed "Queen of Comedy" Sommore storms the stage to deliver a riotous stand-up performance in Charlotte, North Carolina.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Fary Is the New Black
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Armed with sly wit, a fresh outlook and plenty of style, French comedy star Fary veers from dating to stereotypes and beyond in this exclusive special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Fadily Camara : La plus drôle de tes copines
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Irrepressible French comedian Fadily Camara weaves jokes, vivid characters and physical comedy into a lively stand-up show at La Cigale in Paris.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Gina Yashere: Skinny B*tch
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Standup comedian and "Daily Show" correspondent Gina Yashere delivers a sharp set of wry observations on the environment, money and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Gaffigan: King Baby
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Jim Gaffigan offers up his take on bacon, bowling and other weighty topics in this stand-up performance filmed live in Austin on his 2008 comedy tour.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Gaffigan: Mr. Universe
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Funnyman Jim Gaffigan offers up his unique take on everything from Disney World to overweight whales in this live show from Washington, D.C.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Gabriel lglesias: I’m Sorry For What I Said When I Was Hungry
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Hawaiian-shirt enthusiast Gabriel "Fluffy" Iglesias finds the laughs in racist gift baskets, Prius-driving cops and all-female taco trucks.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Gaffigan: Beyond the Pale
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Jim Gaffigan cuts loose on a variety of topics, including Hot Pockets, holidays, Catholicism and his favorite activity: doing nothing.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tom Papa Live in New York City
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Tom Papa riffs on the trials of married life, fatherhood in the 21st century, domestic pets and more in his stand-up show.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin James: Sweat the Small Stuff
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The film and television star riffs on life's many royal pains in this hourlong special taped at New York City's Hudson Theatre in 2001.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Brian Regan: Nunchucks and Flamethrowers
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Brian Regan takes relatable family humor to new heights as he talks board games, underwear elastic and looking for hot dogs in all the wrong places.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin James: Never Don't Give Up
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Kevin James makes his long-awaited return to stand-up in this family-friendly special, dishing on fatherhood, fans, his disdain for allergies and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Nate Bargatze: The Tennessee Kid
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comic Nate Bargatze touches on air travel, cheap weddings, college football, chocolate milk and the perils of ordering coffee in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Seth Meyers: Lobby Baby
Stand-Up Comedy.description: SNL alumnus and subversive master of late-night TV Seth Meyers comes out from behind the desk to share some lighthearted stories from his own life.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tom Papa: You're Doing Great!
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Tom Papa takes on body image issues, social media, pets, Staten Island, the "old days" and more in a special from his home state of New Jersey.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Fortune Feimster: Sweet & Salty
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Actor, comedian and writer Fortune Feimster takes the stage and riffs on her southern roots, sexual awakenings, showbiz career and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ken Jeong: You Complete Me, Ho
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In his first-ever stand-up special, Ken Jeong pays tribute to his wife and shares stories about Hollywood and how "The Hangover" saved his life.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Gabriel "Fluffy" Iglesias: One Show Fits All
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Gabriel "Fluffy" Iglesias discusses his teenage son and encounters with Snoop Dogg, Chris Rock and Vicente Fernández in this stand-up special for 2019.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham: Beside Himself
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Jeff Dunham takes the stage in Dallas with his old pals Peanut, Walter, José Jalapeño, Bubba J and Achmed to poke fun at himself and American culture.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Whitney Cummings: Can I Touch It?
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In her fourth stand-up special, Whitney Cummings returns to her hometown of Washington, D.C., and riffs on modern feminism, technology and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: George Lopez: We'll Do It For Half
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian George Lopez tackles the future and the past of Latinx culture in America, touching on immigration, his tough relatives, aging and much more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Alex Fernández: The Best Comedian in the World
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comic Alex Fernández performs his familiar autobiographical stories but goes a little deeper this time with a tender tale about one of his six siblings.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Nikki Glaser: Bangin’
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Nikki Glaser bares all in a blistering stand-up special about sex, sobriety and getting over her own insecurities. And she won't spare you the details.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jo Koy: In His Elements
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Jo Koy brings the laughs and beats to Manila, spotlighting local culture in a one-of-a-kind show featuring Filipino American comedians, DJs and B-boys.
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Jo Koy, Andrew Lopez, Joey Guila

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mike Birbiglia: Thank God for Jokes
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Mike Birbiglia takes the stage in Brooklyn and hits on hard truths about puppets, late people and the very real dangers of being funny.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mike Birbiglia: What I Should Have Said Was Nothing: Tales from My Secret Public Journal
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Mike Birbiglia performs in this live concert special that features a riotous selection of the unique insights and observations culled from his diary.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Yours Sincerely, Kanan Gill
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Revisiting life goals set in a letter written as a teen to his future self, comedian Kanan Gill reports back on if he's lived up to his own expectations.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Cristela Alonzo: Lower Classy
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The irrepressible Alonzo skewers Latino stereotypes, pricey luxuries and her mother's tough-love parenting in a night of sly and infectious comedy.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Vir Das: For India
Stand-Up Comedy.description: From the Vedas to Vasco da Gama to vacuous Bollywood plotlines, comedian Vir Das celebrates the history of India with his one-of-a-kind perspective.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Zach Galifianakis: Live at the Purple Onion
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The unorthodox, piano-playing stand-up star Zach Galifianakis makes a splash on the scene and serves up a healthy dose of his signature wit.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Felipe Neto: My Life Makes No Sense
Stand-Up Comedy.description: YouTube sensation Felipe Neto brings the stories from his autobiographical book "Não Faz Sentido!" to the stage in this comedy special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Hari Kondabolu: Warn Your Relatives
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Hari Kondabolu breaks down identity politics, celebrity encounters, his mango obsession and more in an unpredictable stand-up comedy special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ryan Hamilton: Happy Face
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Small-town import Ryan Hamilton charms New York with folksy comic observations on big-city life, hot-air ballooning and going to Disney World alone.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Norm Macdonald: Hitler's Dog, Gossip & Trickery
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In this new stand-up special, Norm Macdonald delivers sly, deadpan observations from an older -- and perhaps even wiser -- point of view.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tim Minchin: So F**king Rock
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedic pianist Tim Minchin performs a host of his catchy songs that touch on everything from the Middle East to the healing power of canvas bags.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham: Relative Disaster
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Ventriloquist Jeff Dunham brings his rude and slightly demented posse of puppets to Ireland for a gleeful skewering of family and politics.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham: Controlled Chaos
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Politically incorrect and often raunchy humor pepper ventriloquist Dunham's live concert performance featuring characters Walter, Achmed and Peanut.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Rory Scovel Tries Stand-Up for the First Time
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Rory Scovel storms the stage in Atlanta, where he shares unfocused thoughts about things that mystify him, relationships and the "Thong Song."

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Miranda Sings Live…Your Welcome
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Viral video star Miranda Sings and her real-world alter ego Colleen Ballinger share the stage in a special packed with music, comedy and "magichinry."

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Hicks: Revelations
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In his final recorded special, the iconoclastic comedian channels Goat Boy and tackles provocative topics like British porn, pot and the priesthood.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ralphie May: Imperfectly Yours
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Ralphie May takes to the Las Vegas stage with his raw, rollicking take on men's fashion, racism, sex and even waffles. Filmed live in 2013.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham: Minding the Monsters
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Jeff Dunham returns with a haunted house full of his hysterical entourage, and each character stars in its own horror movie trailer.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Lucas Brothers: On Drugs
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Deadpan twin comics Keith and Kenny Lucas take the stage in Brooklyn with a set that touches on drugs, race, Deion Sanders, teachers and O.J. Simpson.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham's Very Special Christmas Special
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Politically incorrect, sometimes raunchy ventriloquist Jeff Dunham is joined by his irreverent cast of characters in this hilarious Christmas special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Garlin: Our Man In Chicago
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Jeff Garlin (unintentionally) celebrates his 37th year of stand-up and shares his learnings on love, loss, success and food addiction.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Coco y Raulito: Carrusel de ternura
Stand-Up Comedy.description: A study in contrasts, comedy partners and good friends Coco Celis and Raúl Meneses alternate separate stand-up sets for double the laughs.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Joe Rogan: Triggered
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Unleashing his inquisitive, intense comedic style, Rogan explores everything from raising kids and Santa Claus to pot gummies and talking to dolphins.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Hans Teeuwen: Real Rancour
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Hans Teeuwen rebels against political correctness, proclaims himself Britain's moral leader and takes on Donald Trump.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Jefferies: This Is Me Now
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The gleefully irreverent Jefferies skewers "grabby" celebrities, political hypocrisy and his own ill-advised career moves in a brash stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Craig Ferguson: Tickle Fight
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Cheeky comic Craig Ferguson keeps it casual as he discusses '70s porn, Japanese toilets and his mildly crime-filled days as a talk show host.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Dana Carvey: Straight White Male, 60
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Emmy-winning comedian Dana Carvey blends pitch-perfect takes on big personalities with so-true-it-hurts stories from his life as a dad of millennials.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Maz Jobrani: Immigrant
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Iranian American comic Maz Jobrani lights up the Kennedy Center with riffs on immigrant life in the Trump era, modern parenting pitfalls and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: RUSSELL BRAND: RE:BIRTH
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Russell Brand gets loquacious in London as he ruminates on the state of the world and marvels over how his life changed the moment he became a father.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Hicks: Sane Man
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Filmed in 1989 at a turning point in comedian Bill Hicks's career, this rare onstage performance captures him spouting off on a variety of topics.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: D.L. Hughley: Contrarian
Stand-Up Comedy.description: D.L. Hughley riffs on hot-button political issues, celebrity scandals, his mother's tough love and more in a rapid-fire stand-up show in Philadelphia.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Francesco De Carlo: Cose di questo mondo
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Taking the stage in Milan, Francesco De Carlo opens up about his bad habits, religion, politics and what he's learned from traveling the world.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Colin Quinn: Red State Blue State
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Stand-up comedian Colin Quinn calls out the hypocrisies of the left and the right in this special based on his politically charged Off-Broadway show.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham: Unhinged in Hollywood
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Unfiltered ventriloquist Jeff Dunham brings his ragtag crew of puppet pals to Hollywood for big laughs about celebrity culture and California living.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Carlos Ballarta: Furia Ñera
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Mexican comic Carlos Ballarta mocks himself and points out the absurdities of parenthood and how he uses his wife's pregnancies to avoid commitments.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Colin Quinn: Unconstitutional
Stand-Up Comedy.description: New York comedian Colin Quinn writes and stars in this live one-man stage show that dissects and deconstructs U.S. constitutional history.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Saverio Raimondo: Il Satiro Parlante
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Italian comic and satirist Saverio Raimondo regales a Milan crowd with tales of online antics, awkward injuries and white-knuckle flights.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Grillo vs Grillo
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Outspoken comedian Beppe Grillo reminisces about his long career, including the triumphs and controversies that fueled his rise in Italian politics.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Dieter Nuhr: Nuhr in Berlin
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The cerebral and popular German cabaret comic expounds his theories on gender norms, primal instincts and a decidedly gastrointestinal Big Bang.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: David Batra: Elefanten i rummet
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Swedish comedian David Batra gets personal as he playfully details the perks and pitfalls of being married to a recently resigned political leader.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ali Wong: Hard Knock Wife
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Two years after the hit "Baby Cobra," Ali Wong is back with another baby bump -- and a torrent of hilarious truths about marriage and motherhood.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Aditi Mittal: Things They Wouldn't Let Me Say
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Trailblazing comic Aditi Mittal mixes topical stand-up with frank talk about being single, wearing thongs and the awkwardness of Indian movie ratings.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Christina P: Mother Inferior
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Christina Pazsitzky hits Seattle with a biting dose of reality, telling truths about her childhood, getting older and the horrors of giving birth.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katherine Ryan: In Trouble
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Stand-up comic Katherine Ryan reminisces about unusual relationships, life in the hometown she hates and the time she enraged an entire nation.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Iliza Shlesinger: Freezing Hot
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Smart and brazen comedian Iliza Shlesinger applies her fresh, laugh-out-loud perspective to the universal struggles between men and women.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Amy Schumer: The Leather Special
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comic sensation Amy Schumer riffs on sex, dating and the absurdities of fame in a bold and uncensored stand-up set at Denver's Bellco Theater.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Malena Pichot: Estupidez compleja
Stand-Up Comedy.description: An Argentine comedian espouses the values of feminism, speaking on topics like sex, language, abortion and why it's OK to let a man buy you dinner.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Lynne Koplitz: Hormonal Beast
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Unabashed comedian Lynne Koplitz offers a woman's take on being crazy, the benefits of childlessness and the three things all men really want.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sofía Niño de Rivera: Exposed
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Self-deprecating comic Sofía Niño de Rivera puts her sarcasm on full display in this stand-up special filmed live at Guadalajara's Degollado Theater.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sofía Niño de Rivera: Selección Natural
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Mexico's Sofía Niño de Rivera brings her dark humor to the stage with jokes about marriage traps, sexually attractive leopards and funny funerals.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Natalia Valdebenito: Gritona
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Chile's Natalia Valdebenito hits Santiago's Teatro Caupolicán with a one-woman show steeped in irony, a dash of improv and her own personal style.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mea Culpa
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Raw and outspoken, comedian Alexis de Anda bares her soul about weddings, exercise, sex, gynecologists, drugs and much more in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Park Na-rae: Glamour Warning
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Korea’s beloved comedian and favorite big sister figure talks sex, relationships and celebrity life. And she’s sassier and dirtier than ever before.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Natalia Valdebenito: El especial
Stand-Up Comedy.description: A Chilean comedian fuses activism with irreverence for a stand-up set filled with jokes about misogyny, reproductive rights and respecting women.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sam Kinison: Live in Vegas
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Standup legend Sam Kinison is at his screaming best as he storms the stage in Sin City to get a few things off his chest.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Jefferies : BARE
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Nothing is sacred in this show from Australian comic Jim Jefferies, whether it’s the mother of his child, auditioning disabled actors, or gun control.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Moshe Kasher: Live in Oakland
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comic Moshe Kasher returns to his home turf of Oakland for this stand-up special that has him sharing uproarious stories about the people he's met.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sam Kinison: Family Entertainment Hour
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comic Sam Kinison lets it rip with this performance at L.A.'s Wiltern theatre, skewering every segment of modern society from religion to television.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Carlos Ballarta: El amor es de putos
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Carlos Ballarta mocks daily life in Mexico, including public transit, the education system and the corn seller who betrays your confidence.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Hicks: One Night Stand
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Bill Hicks remembers a wild night in 1989 and offers his views on puffing cigarettes, smoking weed, drinking, sex, commercials and music.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Franco Escamilla: Bienvenido al mundo
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Franco Escamilla shares stories about parenting his children when they get into trouble, with reflections on gender, friendship and romance.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Gad Gone Wild
Stand-Up Comedy.description: French comic Gad Elmaleh regales a Montreal crowd with tales of awkward mix-ups and baffling customs he's encountered since moving to the U.S.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Fakkah Fuzz: Almost Banned
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Stand-up comic Fakkah Fuzz mines cross-cultural humor from the experience of growing up as an outspoken Malay man in Singapore.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Dany Boon: Des Hauts De France
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In an eclectic one-man show, French superstar Dany Boon reflects on his homeland, his first comedy gig and the challenges of parenting hostile teens.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Liss Pereira: Reteniendo líquidos
Stand-Up Comedy.description: A pregnant Liss Pereira shares hilariously uncomfortable truths about sex, love, attraction and the lies we tell in modern relationships.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Agustín Aristarán: Soy Rada
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Argentine comedian Agustín Aristarán adds doses of magic, music and acting to his high-energy stand-up routine.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Alan Saldaña: Mi vida de pobre
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Mexican comic Alan Saldaña has fun with everything from the pressure of sitting in an exit row to maxing out his credit card in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Thiago Ventura: POKAS
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In a rollicking special, Thiago Ventura jokes about life in the hood, social issues and more, explaining how actions speak louder than words.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Luciano Mellera: Infantiloide
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Argentina's Luciano Mellera emphasizes the humorous and fantastical aspects of childhood through comedic impersonations and insights on daily life.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Daniel Sosa: Sosafado
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Daniel Sosa inhabits various characters, including a Tupperware dealer, a thirsty priest and a Trojan horse soldier in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kenny Sebastian: The Most Interesting Person in the Room
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Fusing his musical and stand-up chops, Kenny Sebastian gets analytical about frumpy footwear, flightless birds and his fear of not being funny enough.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Fernando Sanjiao: Hombre
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Argentine actor and comedian Fernando Sanjiao uses humor and impersonations to explore the concepts of masculinity and fatherhood in modern times.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Enissa Amani: Ehrenwort
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Live from Hamburg, Iranian-German comedian Enissa Amani shares her take on German engineering, tax deductions and online fan-mail etiquette.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Simplemente Manu NNa
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Eclectic stand-up comic Manu NNa relays everyday tales about the struggles of being gay in Mexico and shares his love of telenovelas and mezcal.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mau Nieto: Viviendo sobrio… desde el bar
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Performing at a bar, Mexican stand-up comedian Mau Nieto dishes on his modest upbringing, his failed relationships and his attempts to stay sober.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sebastián Marcelo Wainraich
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Argentine comedian Sebastián Wainraich highlights the comedy in everyday life, from minibars to reasons why funerals are better than weddings.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Amit Tandon: Family Tandoncies
Stand-Up Comedy.description: From the death of romance in marriage to the injustices of modern-day parenting, Amit Tandon shares wisdom and wisecracks as a battle-scarred family guy.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Arango y Sanint: Ríase el show
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Colombian stand-up comedians Antonio Sanint and Julián Arango impersonate an Argentine visitor and a cabbie, and a pair of dirty old men at the opera.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kavin Jay: Everybody Calm Down!
Stand-Up Comedy.description: On a mission to defy stereotypes, Malaysian stand-up comedian Kavin Jay shares stories about growing up in the VHS era with his Singapore audience.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Whindersson Nunes: Adult
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Brazilian YouTube sensation Whindersson Nunes revisits his humble beginnings and much more in a series of playful stories and peculiar songs.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ricardo Quevedo: Hay gente así
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Droll comic Ricardo Quevedo hits Bogotá with a set that touches on embarrassing misunderstandings, sex talk, the thrill of being scared and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Todo lo que sería Lucas Lauriente
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In his stand-up set, Argentine comic Lucas Lauriente animatedly rattles off reflections on different generations and begs kids to stop saying "goals."

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Alejandro Riaño: Especial de stand up
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Colombian comedian Alejandro Riaño discusses the perks of dating a she-wolf, styles of dancing, the quirks of Bogotá men and soccer game announcers.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: El Especial de Alex Fernández, el Especial
Stand-Up Comedy.description: From a Mexico City theme park, energetic stand-up Alex Fernández riffs on music, cheap toys, insecurity and other fun things about growing up.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ricardo O'Farrill Abrazo Genial
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Ricardo O'Farrill brings his sharp, observational humor to the stage with a relentless sarcasm and specific Mexican sensibility. Prepare for mockery.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin Hart: I'm a Grown Little Man
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Stand-up comedy star Kevin Hart delivers his unique perspective on work, race, family and friends with this laugh-riot comedy show.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: David A. Arnold: Fat Ballerina
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Finally comfortable in his skin, seasoned comic David A. Arnold shares his talent for doing nothing, how he's petty and why divorce saves marriages.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Arsenio Hall: Smart & Classy
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In his first stand-up special, Arsenio Hall discusses getting older, the changing times and culture, social issues and even bothersome baby toes.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mike Epps: Don't Take It Personal
